getTradeInArmies(int) - Method in class soen6441riskgame.models.CardSet
get the armies that can be trade by the set The first set traded in - 4 armies The second set traded in - 6 armies The third set traded in - 8 armies The fourth set traded in - 10 armies The fifth set traded in - 12 armies The sixth set traded in - 15 armies After the sixth set has been traded in, each additional set is worth 5 more armies.

H

handleAttackCommand(String[]) - Method in class soen6441riskgame.controllers.GameController
it handles the attack command If args[0] is "-noattack" then user choose not to attack and the player moves on to next phase fortification
handleAttackMoveCommand(String[]) - Method in class soen6441riskgame.controllers.GameController
it handles the attack move command and moves the army from attacking country to defending country after the attacker has won the defending country.
handleDefendCommand(String[]) - Method in class soen6441riskgame.controllers.GameController
it handles the defend command and executes the entire attack and calls the dice roll method.
handleGamePlayerCommand(String[]) - Method in class soen6441riskgame.controllers.GameController
handle gameplayer command
handleMultipleFortificationCommand(String[]) - Method in class soen6441riskgame.controllers.GameController
move any number of armies from one country to another if they are connected If last argument is "none" or "-none" then user choose not to do a move.
handlePlaceAllCommand() - Method in class soen6441riskgame.controllers.GameController
automatically randomly place all remaining unplaced armies for all players
